content:
Wolfinger family

1 Wulf Perez WOLFINGER               1752-54 - 1812 #96   {census family 70}
 + Jutel                             1753-55 (Perez)
  2o Judith WOHLFINGER               1775-77 - 1835 #192
    * Abraham HARTUCK                1774-76 - 1831 #248 (Herzki)  {census family 71}
        FAMILY LISTING
  2x Israel WOLFINGER                1779-81 - 1847 #732
    + Schondel BREIGLER??            1784-86 - 1844 #57
          married Nov 25, 1799 Krakow
     3x Moses Leibel WOLFINGER       Feb 6, 1806 Krakow - Nov 22, 1889 #448
       + Malka OBSTFELD              1808-10 - after 1890
             married 1828 #11

          * Samuel RICHTER           1825 Chrzanow - Mar 19, 1887 #106 (Izrael+Rachel MONDSCHEIN)

                   married 1893 #109

             * Dydie Mendel WERDIGER  Jul 1853 Wolbrom

                + Rebeka URVATER     Jan 9, 1889 #12

                 7x Michel WERDIGER  Jul 6, 1917 Gravenhaga
              6o Ruchel WERDIGER     Oct 19, 1888 #615 - Oct 23, 1985 Antwerp
                * unknown DORF 
              6x Szyja WERDIGER      Jan 25, 1896 #39 - May 20, 1954 Antwerp
           5x Nechemie RICHTER       Apr 8, 1856 #217
           5x Abraham RICHTER        1855 / Jun 1858 Krakow
             + Golda ROSEN           1863 / Mar 1865 Dobczyce Wieliczka
              6o Chana RICHTER       Aug 2, 1889 #646
              6x Samuel RICHTER      Apr 10, 1895 #211
        4x Abraham Dawid WOLFINGER   1832 #43 - 1832 #388
        4x Pinkus Jakob WOLFINGER    1834 #231 - 1837 #237
        4o Itel (Jetty) WOLFINGER    1836 #541
          * Jozua Lipman SPIRA       1829 - May 14, 1888 #158
                married Jul 29, 1855 #155
              FAMILY LISTING

One of the genealogists with interest in this family is: Eliyahu Hershfeld
